word:
Success in any field means support for that field. Success brings with it increased responsibilities. It means that the work must widen, that the church must put forth every effort to properly sustain the advancing work. It means that new territory must be annexed, that the standard must be planted in towns and cities that have not heard the word of truth.-- Manuscript 99, 1901, pp. 5-7. 

Ellen G. White Estate Washington, D. C. July 19, 1984
